item.description:
Optimum Health Solution and Raw New England Community once again Proudly Present:

Dr. Brian Clement

PhD, L.N., N.M.D., author, international lecturer & director of the renowned Hippocrates Health Institute in Florida

 

He will Speak on:

"Dealing with Disease and Cancer: Our Toxic World".

 

Dr. Clement will guide us through simple techniques for maintainin g a strong immune system.  He will also address the half century of work on disease conducted at the renowned Hippocrates Institute.  Cancer, cardiovascular disease, diabetes, MS, ALS, Parkinsons, fibromyalgia and more can be altered, prevented, and at times conquered with phyto-chemicals, antioxidants and other nutrients consumed on a diet of organic vegan living food. Dr. Clement will answer all your questions. Don't miss this rare opportunity. 

 

Tuesday, September 27th 7:00 PM to 9:30 PM
Unitarian Universalist Church, 50 Church St. Waltham MA. Click Here For Directions
Registration and buying Brian's books and special products at 6:30 PM
Investment:  $15 on-line or by check prior to Sept 26 or $20 at the door.  Special offer Dr. T's Friday, September 23rd lecture and Dr. Clement's lecture for only $25 for 2 lectures.  

Send checks payable to: Optimum Health Solution, 337 Newton St. Apt 4, Waltham MA 02453.
(Be sure to indicate what the check is for in the memo section)
Tickets for all events soon be found at www.optimumhealthsolution.org   

 

Dr. Clement is the Director of the world renowned Hippocrates Health Institute in Florida.  He has pioneered a program that has established training in active aging and disease prevention. Dr. Clement is a licensed Nutritionist having graduated from the University of Science, Arts, and Technology.
item.name: Dr. Brian Clement (Unitarian Universalist Church, Waltham, MA)
